title: paahi ramaramaNa
sahitya:
pAhi ramAramaNa mAm pAhi sadguNa gaNa harE mAm

caraNam 1

 cinta mAna nIdu karuNa isumanta rAdu harE rAma
   
caraNam 2

 entani sairintu nE vEgintu harE rAma
   
caraNam 3

 cEti mallEpUvu guNDrAti kOrva bOdu harE rAma
   
caraNam 4

 dOsa panDu keTTu rAma tOcu ninupAkaTTu harE rAma
   
caraNam 5

 ahaha cilukakUna brahmAstramunaku taguna harE rAma
   
caraNam 6

 talli taNDri brOva kuNTE tanayuni kEdrOva harE rAma
   
caraNam 7

 dEva dEva venna kaTTidebba kOrcu kOnuna harE rAma
   
caraNam 8

 rAjavarya sharaNa tyAgarAja vinuta caraNa harE rAma
